atk-s0401a11:1: 140. Ekādasame vagge adhammaṁ adhammotiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0401a11:4_0: 150. Dvādasame pana anāpattiṁ āpattītiādīsu “anāpatti ajānantassa atheyyacittassa
atk-s0401a11:4_1: namaraṇādhippāyassa anullapanādhippāyassa namocanādhippāyassā”ti tattha tattha vuttā
atk-s0401a11:4_2: anāpatti anāpatti nāma, “jānantassa theyyacittassā”tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti āpatti
atk-s0401a11:4_3: nāma, pañcāpattikkhandhā lahukāpatti nāma, dve āpattikkhandhā garukāpatti nāma. Dve
atk-s0401a11:4_4: āpattikkhandhā duṭṭhullāpatti nāma, pañcāpattikkhandhā aduṭṭhullāpatti nāma. Cha
atk-s0401a11:4_5: āpattikkhandhā sāvasesāpatti nāma, eko pārājikāpattikkhandho anavasesāpatti nāma.
atk-s0401a11:4_6: Sappaṭikammāpatti nāma sāvasesāpattiyeva, appaṭikammāpatti nāma anavasesāpattiyeva.
